Im obsessed w/ building houses of any kinds. I've only built about 5 redstone contraptions, but i bet I've built over 25* houses in my MC career. I like to challenge myself sometimes by trying to build a functioning house that looks good in a 4*4*4 cube.

*Edited from 50 because of a re-count. That's what happens when you try to remember numbers at 00:30.

EDIT:

A few of my houses. I'll take screens of the insides or close-up of the houses if anybody wants them.

Built off of one of those pyramid temple things you find scattered around minecraft. Has 4 floors and working doorbell. My best construct and I'm still building onto it.

Challenged myself to build a small house. Has 3 floors, with one being a storage room, one a crafting and furnacing area with storage as well, and one being the bedroom.
